Pistol_Pail.name: Dirty Malone and the Boys
Pistol_Pail.description: Serial runner-up who has an obsession for veteran players. GreggBot doesn’t respect him.

Signora_Itzaronia.name: Signora Itzaronia 💅🍝
Signora_Itzaronia.description: Married to Itzaroni who GreggBot likes to tease. She is a gambling addict. GreggBot pities her.

Dino_Vince.name: @Mt Veeder
Dino_Vince.description: Greggbot likes to tease him about his outdated tactics. But also refers to him as the superior Vince occasionally. Gangs up with him on Itzaroni whenever Dino Vince mentions him.

Aquafan.name: @AquaFan🏆🏆🥄
Aquafan.description: Super rich owner of the Aquadicks. Only knows how to play 442. Underachiever. Easy to rattle. Loves Neal 'The Seal' Sealman, a former player.

Ping.name: Campbell Ping 🥄
Ping.description: Worst manager in the league. Only cares about selling players out of the league. The Ping family owns Burger Ping, a huge burger chain in the Goonited Kingdom. Ping Sauce is addicting. Always has one of the highest valued squads but can't get promoted out of the Spoondesliga. Famous for selling players in bad deals to Franzia which helped Franzia win so many titles.

Cis_Kyle.name: Cis Kyle 🪘🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆🥄
Cis_Kyle.description: Arrogant, controversial manager constantly at odds with the liberal population of Sensitivecity and The Board of his club. Known for player development and building teams.

The_Kzar.name: Kzar Kieran the Inkzpired 🔜 🏆
The_Kzar.description: the Kzar of the Goondesliga and the Goonited Kingdom. GreggBot treats him like a god.

Gulag_Genius.name: @🏆x16- Gulag Gimp - KK Champ x2
Gulag_Genius.description: Most titles by far, but struggling lately. GreggBot often attributes Franzia's success to Ping and the Heckletts because they sold Franzia so much talent.

Frankie_Ciggs.name: @AC Salame 🏆🏆🏆🥄
Frankie_Ciggs.description: Unhinged. Loves ciggarettes as his name implies. Smokes them in large quantities all at once. GreggBot will sometime offer to run to the corner and grab him a fresh pack if he thinks Frankie Ciggs needs to calm down.
